item.description:
June Meeting Set for 7 PM at St. Mark's in Dorchester

The Greater Boston Chapter of the Fatherhood Coalition will meet on Tuesday, June 23 at 7PM at St Markâ€™s church hall, 20 Roseland Street (at 1725 Dorchester Avenue), Dorchester. For more information, please call 617-723-3237 or Joe at 857 350-0575.

We are a chapter of the state-wide The Fatherhood Coalition: www.fatherhoodcoalition.org.
